name: Seers of the Marigold Tavern
description: Part of the tight knit community formed at Eddieâ€™s Tavern, the Seers of the Marigold Tavern are known for their strength, vitality, and good fortune. Now guiding travelers that attempt to cross the continent in the dead of night, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
